alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 02 at 12:23AM PDT until April 04 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 with gusts to 55 mph in Owens Valley...with wind gusts exceeding 75 mph in the Eastern Sierra. Winds shifting to the north on Monday. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes and Owens Valley. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong crosswinds will be possible on the US-395 corridor Sunday afternoon and night before winds shift to the northwest on Monday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley
